data.title: Amazing Grace by Dolly Parton
data.meta_description: Amazing Grace by Dolly Parton was written by John Newton and [Traditional] and was first released by The Original Sacred Harp Choir in 1922. Dolly Parton released it on the album Precious Memories in 1999. It was covered by Natasha Miller, The Bostok Band Show, Stanisław Sojka, Charles Brown and other artists.
